template.title: Conditioning (run/walk or bike intervals) + grip/core
good: Peloton Low Impact 20 min + 5 min core
OR Run/Walk 20 min (1 min run / 1 min walk)
better: Run: warm-up 8 min; 8 rounds 30s hard / 90s easy; cool-down 5 min
best: Peloton Intervals 30-45 min OR Run: 6x2 min hard / 2 min easy

template.title: Mobility / recovery (Wednesday double)
good: 5-10 min: couch stretch 60s/side + calves 60s/side + open books 8/side
better: 10-20 min mobility flow + 2 min nasal breathing (long exhales)

template.title: Strength B (squat + pull + carries/sandbag)
best: Sandbag carry density 10 min (40-60s carry / 40-60s rest)
programOptions: P90X3: Eccentric Lower (be cautious first time)

template.title: Zone 2 (ruck or easy ride) + mobility
good: Ruck 20 lb: 20-30 min easy OR easy ride 20-30 min
best: Ruck 20-30 lb: 60-75 min if joints/feet feel great
OR 45 min Zone 2 ride + 10 min mobility

template.title: Tactical circuit (mixed modal) + sandbag finisher + pull-ups
good: 2 rounds easy: 10 swings (35), 8 goblet squats (35), 8 push-ups, 40s suitcase carry/side
better: AMRAP 18-20 min: 12 swings (44), 8 DB push press, 10 rows total, 8 step-ups/burpees (scaled)
best: 5 rounds: 90s hard (sandbag carry + swings) / 90s easy walk
Sandbag carry density 10 min (60-80 lb if solid)

template.title: Recovery + readiness (Sunday before 15:00-23:00 shift)
best: 20-30 min easy ride/walk + mobility (stop before fatigue)

carryFinisher.title: Carry Finisher Menu (for 'S&S + carries')
better: OR Farmer carry/hold: 4 rounds x 45-60s; rest ~60s
best: Farmer carry ladder: 5 rounds x 60s with 60s rest
OR Sandbag bear-hug carry: 4-6 rounds x 40-60s with 60-90s rest (50-60 lb start; build to 60-80)
